title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.5 - Review of applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.5 - Review of applications

State Regulations

Following staff study, examination and review of each
project application, the commission shall hold a public hearing upon notice
thereon as provided in section 14.4(b) of the Compact and may take such action
on a project application as it finds to be appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
831.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
